attributes.action: Impose an profit cap for energy companies per kWh
attributes.additional_details: Currently energy companies make a percentile markup profit on energy bills.  This means that as wholesale prices increase, their profits increase, whilst the public have to pay more money.
attributes.background: There should be a flat cap on the amount of profit that can be made per kWh instead of a percentage.  This will bring users bill costs down and prevent profiting from the energy crisis

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on the energy price cap levels are a matter for Ofgem rather than the UK Government or Parliament directly.
